message: It is so much not beta yet. My mother has more beta than Starry Expanse!
Welcome to Beta! A place to complain about how much beta isn't here yet.
Take SE as an example, if you need the best Beta-blocker available :-P
There is so much beta not here right now..
We do have a list of *counts* 448 people...

Be patient... Beta will come when the guys have enough content to justify it, I know we are all keen but give them space to breathe guys. The more time they take getting the look and feel of it right the better it will be. Personally, I would rather wait for a beta of quality rather than one that has been cobbled together and pushed out to keep everybody happy. That's what Microsoft do every time they pump out a new version of Windows or Office, then spend the next year issuing patches to cover the holes.
Hey everyone, let's ignore the guy above & keep complaining just because we can.
But remember, beta is likely to be very frustrating! Beta versions often suffer from critical bugs and glitches! We have to remember that beta is a kinda sorta preview of it. At least I think.
By the way, where am I on the beta list?
Wait, so "the higher your name is on list, the more likely you are to be on the beta team" is just a ploy to get people to sign up?!
beta list is just a collection, not in a particular order.
Hmm, now I don't remember if I actually signed up for the beta. Is there any way to check or should I just send another request? (I know I _donated_ so I'd hope to be on beta ;))
@mgiuca Looks like you are signed up. In other news, I know how to use phpMyAdmin.

@Ahlisendar we currently have not made any plans on how the beta will work, including the admissions process. That being said, we did at one point say that it would be first-come-first serve, so we may end up doing that, and there is also a chance that not everybody who signed up will get to test, unfortunately.

Lol @zib, I saw that flurry of posts, deletes and re-posts :) Trouble with Convore is it's too fast. As soon as you posted "looks like you aren't signed up", I immediately went and registered, which might have explained why it looked like I wasn't signed up, and then suddenly I was. :p

I probably decided not to sign up when I discovered this project many months ago because I wanted to wait until the finished product. But now after months of hitting "refresh" on your home page I don't care. I want to play this ASAP!
@mgiuca The other option is that I was only looking at the first 30 entries, not realizing that it went back like 20 pages from there :P Hence the "I know how to use phpMyAdmin"
@kraidridley Yeh, cheers guy - that's really helpful... Bet you go down well at parties...

I'm sure I'm on the beta list... but we want now! I have an idea; completely finish an age (say Prison Island) and release that for the public to play with/ test specs/ whinge or praise Unity lol. Then release the full fledged beta.

Beta's primary goal is not to please our fans. Things like our website, it's updates, Mysterium presentations and Convore are. Beta is to test if our game logics and mechanics work, and if our audience likes the total package. We could however discuss if some teaser 'realRiven' related demo can be made and shared. Reason for a special topic perhaps, to throw ideas at us?
